name: Bitscape
description:
In Bitscape, you struggle with simple controls to complete a somewhat seemingly easy objective. Until, of course, 30 seconds later your heart is beating in your ears, blood tearing through your veins, breaths slowing, eyes focusing, and suddenly, you crash. Worst and greatest feeling ever. Escape the world and feel alive again, only in Bitscape.

=====================================

If you have any feedback, head over to my website http://www.azeganindustries.weebly.com and submit a contact form. I would love to hear what you have to say! If you would like to see more games from me, please follow me and stay updated with my youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5GLuiuSE1W5Zu6Sa...
